notes: User confirmed: NO backward compatibility required. Overwrite existing APIs freely.

previous_work.summary: Fixed Import from Secrets to build full graph with org, units, people, and edges

key_points: Intent types prefixed by origin: Ui*, Port*, Domain*, Error*
Model must have pure with_* update methods
Graph building is pure function - no I/O
File I/O is async → use Task::perform
Graph building is synchronous in update()
Order matters: Orgs → Units → Locations → People → Edges
Relationships are first-class with RelationshipType enum

critical_findings: OrganizationGraph → OrganizationConcept (Graph is implementation, not domain)
GraphNode → ConceptEntity (Technical term, not ubiquitous language)
NodeType enum violates DDD - Person IS a Person, not 'type of node'
GraphMessage → OrganizationIntent (conflates UI events with domain ops)
Position should be Point3<f64> on unit sphere, not 2D screen Point
Need KnowledgeLevel (Unknown/Suspected/KnownUnknown/Known)
Need evidence_cids: Vec<String> and confidence: f64
Boundaries should use Voronoi tessellation, not manual edges
Topology needs evolution state machine
conceptual_spaces_expert.key_insight: The graph should be a projection of semantic reality, not a data structure

critical_findings: CRITICAL: Domain models embedded in GUI instead of using cim-domain-*
2,847-line gui.rs mixing UI, domain, PKI, NATS concerns
NodeType hardcoded to cim-keys specific types
Missing LiftableDomain trait implementation
cim-domain-person and cim-domain-organization are OPTIONAL and NOT USED
Direct mutation in update function
Side effects (port calls) in update logic
Mixed Message types without categorization
No referential transparency
No composability
48 tests exist but no GUI/MVI tests
No pure function tests
No property-based tests
Limited event algebra tests
No projection tests
No .feature files
No Gherkin scenarios
No executable specifications
NodeType enum must be replaced with DomainNode coproduct preserving injections
LiftableDomain is a FAITHFUL FUNCTOR with monad structure (unit, bind, join)
Graph is a COLIMIT-PRESERVING FUNCTOR from CIM_Domain category
Use Kan Extensions for universal lifting: Lan_D G
Domain composition via natural transformations between functors

key_traits.DomainEntity: Object in Domain Category - id(), type
key_traits.DomainNodeFolder: Universal property - fold pattern for coproduct

act_expert.key_insight: The graph is a categorically correct projection - use proper coproducts, Kan extensions, and faithful functors to preserve all domain semantics

cim_domain_crates.note: Dependencies listed but code defines own inline versions. Need to add: cim-domain-spaces (Sprint 6), cim-domain-relationship (Sprint 1)

cim_graph.used: partially - for graph structure, but not for domain composition

current.note_frp: A3, A5, A7, A9 proven (4/10). A4 (Causality) requires MessageFactory migration - UUID v7 structure exists but causation_id often None.
current.note_inline_models: Bootstrap types kept for JSON loading with conversion functions
current.note_liftable: LiftableDomain implemented for Organization, OrganizationUnit, Person, Location
current.note_nodetype: OrganizationalNodeType removed; Injection coproduct has 25 variants with creatable() subset
current.note_documentation: README.md, CLAUDE.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, MIGRATION_GUIDE.md, REFACTORING_PLAN.md, N_ARY_FRP_AXIOMS.md

tasks.description: Verify all cim-domain-* crates are accessible
tasks.note: All 7 crates verified: cim-domain, cim-domain-location, cim-domain-person, cim-domain-organization, cim-domain-policy, cim-domain-agent, cim-domain-relationship (needs adding)

tasks.description: Consult ACT expert for categorical foundations
tasks.note: Added coproduct, functor, Kan extension, monad structures

deliverables: Baseline metrics documented (8058 LOC, 21 NodeType variants, 6 inline models)

sprint_1.name: Extract Domain Layer
acceptance_criteria: Domain types imported from cim-domain-* crates - ACHIEVED
Bootstrap types documented for JSON loading - ACHIEVED
Conversion functions for bootstrap → domain - ACHIEVED
All 269 tests pass - ACHIEVED
Compilation successful - ACHIEVED
sprint_1.notes: Changed approach: instead of removing bootstrap types entirely, we: 1) Import canonical domain types as DomainX, 2) Keep bootstrap types for JSON loading, 3) Add conversion functions. This allows incremental migration without breaking existing functionality.

tasks.description: Update all imports and references (367 total)

acceptance_criteria: No 'OrganizationGraph' in code - ACHIEVED (0 occurrences)
No 'GraphNode' in code - ACHIEVED (0 occurrences)
No 'GraphEdge' in code - ACHIEVED (0 occurrences)

sprint_2.notes: File renaming (graph.rs → concept.rs, graph_*.rs → concept_*.rs) deferred to avoid breaking imports. Current approach renames types while keeping file names for stability.

sprint_3.name: Remove NodeType Enum

tasks.note: Found OrganizationalNodeType (6 variants) only used in add-node menu
Changed approach: use existing Injection enum instead of new ConceptMember

tasks.description: Replace OrganizationalNodeType with Injection in Message enum
Update menu navigation to use Injection::creatable()
Update node creation match arms to use Injection variants
Add wildcard arm for non-creatable injection types
Import Injection at module level in gui.rs

acceptance_criteria: NodeType enum removed - ACHIEVED (OrganizationalNodeType deleted)
Domain identity preserved - ACHIEVED (Injection coproduct has 25 variants)
GraphRenderable trait - DEFERRED (existing DomainNode.injection() provides dispatch)
sprint_3.notes: Changed approach from original plan: instead of creating new ConceptMember enum, leveraged existing Injection coproduct which already provides type-safe domain identity. Added creatable() and is_creatable() methods to Injection for menu filtering.

sprint_4.name: Implement MVI Intent Layer

sprint_4.notes: Sprint 4 was discovered to be already complete from previous session. Verified compilation (0 errors) and tests (1126 passed).

tasks.note: Ports passed in, used in Task::perform
